smartr 0.1.0
  • Reference

Get the cumulative population size range

roll_sum_range.Rd

Get the cumulative population size range

roll_sum_range(v, na = c("na.rm", "na.omit"), as_char = FALSE)

Arguments

v

A vector of population sizes to apply the cumulative population size range calculations on
na

How should missing values be treated? Either `na.rm` to remove or `na.omit` to omit by assigning a value of 0. Default is to omit.
as_char

Logical. Should output be a character vector or a data.frame of two values. Default to FALSE.

Value

A vector of cumulative population size range

Examples

roll_sum_range(v = clusterList$pop)

#>     lower_range upper_range
